assertions.assertion: pthread_attr_getscope shall get the inheritsched attribute in the attr argument The contentionscope attribute may have the values PTHREAD_SCOPE_SYSTEM, signifying system scheduling contention scope, or PTHREAD_SCOPE_PROCESS, signifying process scheduling contention scope.
If succesful, the pthread_attr_getscope shall return zero.
If fail, the pthread_attr_getscope shall return an error number.
